title: Hey Tiger, Nice 'Mom' Jeans!
headline: Hey Tiger, Nice 'Mom' Jeans!
description: On the course, he's spiffy -- tailored slacks, bold patterns, sleek style. But off the greens, Tiger Woods has opted for swimming button-downs, baggy sweatshirts and the repeat offender: the dreaded Roseanne-esque 'Mom Jean.' Check out Tiger's denim disasters over the years.
body: On the course, he's spiffy -- tailored slacks, bold patterns, sleek style. But off the greens, Tiger Woods has opted for swimming button-downs, baggy sweatshirts and the repeat offender: the dreaded Roseanne-esque 'Mom Jean.' Check out Tiger's denim disasters over the years.
